tests.title: TC03 - Verify Search Bar is visible on Homepage
tests.fullTitle: Home Page Tests TC03 - Verify Search Bar is visible on Homepage
tests.code:
cy.visit('http://localhost:8080'); // replace with your Shopizer URL
cy.get('input[type="text"][name="q"]') // adjust selector if needed
.should('be.visible').and('have.attr', 'placeholder', 'Search'); // optional check for placeholder text
